popover.primary: A mastery path focused on offence and greatswords.
A mastery path focused on defence and protection.
A mastery path focused on magical attacks and effects.

data.name: Deflect Oil
data.description: 25% reduction in damage taken by Oil siege engines. You will also protect two other group mates within 30 feet. Only one effect of this type may be on a player at a time.

data.name: Modify War Engine
data.note: Only usable on Rams
data.description: You shield the Ram absorbing 1500 damage over the next 30 seconds.

data.name: Bulwark
data.note: Only usable on Doors
data.description: Repairs a friendly keep door for 5% of it's total health over 15 seconds.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Throw
data.description: A basic throwing attack that inflicts 79 damage. Has a chance to deal 678 damage to a severely wounded target if you are behind them.

data.name: Sudden Shift
data.description:
With a graceful sweep, you quickly change your stance and prepare for battle.

No Balance: You gain Improved Balance.
Improved Balance: You gain Perfect Balance.
Perfect Balance: You gain Improved Balance.

data.name: Taunt
data.description: You enrage your opponent, interrupting any currently building abilities and forcing monsters to attack you. While taunted your opponent will take 30% more damage from your attacks. This effect will fade after 15 seconds or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.

data.name: Demolishing Strike
data.description: A powerful melee attack that reduces  your target's armor by 1056 and deals 900 damage over 15 seconds

data.name: Centuries of Training
data.description: Upon striking a target with a direct damage ability there is a 25% chance to inflict an additional 252 Spirit damage over 3 seconds.

data.name: Hold The Line!
data.note: Requires Shield
data.description:
You focus your defenses against enemy fire, increasing your chances to dodge and disrupt by 45% for 12 seconds. You will also defend all allies behind you, up to 50 feet away, increasing their chances to dodge and disrupt by 15% as long as they remain at your back. Allies may have this effect stacked on them up to 3 times.
This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of action points.

data.name: Guard
data.note: Only usable on other players
data.description:
You defend one of your groupmates and try to take attacks meant for them. As long as you are within 30 feet of them, any damage that they suffer will be split evenly between the two of you, and 35% of all hate that they cause will be redirected to you.

Damage received from this ability can be blocked or parried, unless the original attack was undefendable.

data.name: Juggernaut
data.description: You become filled with unstoppable power, removing all snaring, rooting, silencing, and disarming effects.

data.name: Shield Wall
data.note: Requires Shield
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, your chance to block is almost guaranteed.

data.name: Focused Offense
data.description: You deal 15% more damage and all enemy monsters will hate you 15% less than normal, but your armor is reduced by 33%.

data.name: Ensorcelled Agony
data.description: Ensorcelled Blow will now cause an additional 365 Spirit damage over 5 seconds.

data.name: Rugged
data.description: Increases Toughness by 160.

data.name: Champion's Challenge
data.description:
Both you and your target are held tightly in place for 10 seconds, and neither one of you can move.
This effect cannot be dispelled or broken.

data.name: Bend the Winds
data.description: Increases your Elemental resistance by 252.

data.name: Challenge
data.description: You challenge all opponents in front of you, forcing monsters to attack you. While challenged, your opponents will deal only 70% damage to everyone other than you. This effect will fade after 15 seconds or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.

data.name: Raze
data.description: You repeatedly attack all enemies in a line in front of you, inflicting 300 damage every second  for 3 seconds, up to 65 feet away, for as long as you maintain your concentration.

data.name: Bolstering Enchantments
data.description: When Blade Enchants trigger they will now restore 405 health over 10 seconds to your group members within 100 feet of you.

data.name: Shatter Enchantment
data.note: Target must have an Enchantment
data.description: A shattering attack that removes one Enchantment from your enemy and deals 119 damage.

data.name: Discerning Offense
data.description: Your attacks have a 10% reduced chance to be defended against.

data.name: Distracting Bellow
data.description: A loud shout that startles your target and all enemies within 30 feet of them, reducing their damage to 50% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Menace
data.description: Enemy monsters will hate you 100% more than normal on all attacks.

data.name: Isha's Protection
data.description: Heals are 20% more effective on you.

data.name: Guard of Steel
data.description: Protective magic increases Toughness by 120 for 20 seconds for each group member within 100 feet.

data.name: Unstoppable Juggernaut
data.description: Juggernaut's cooldown is reduced to 20 seconds.

data.name: Aethyric Grasp
data.description: Roots up to 4 enemies within 30 feet of you, making them unable to move for 5 seconds. Root has a 50% chance to break whenever hit.

data.name: Potent Enchantments
data.description: Blade Enchantments will also deal 540 Spirit damage over 9 seconds whenever they trigger.

data.name: Wings of Heaven
data.description: You magically leap through the air towards your target.  When you land, all enemies within 25 feet around you will become snared for 10 seconds, reducing their run speed by 30%.

data.name: Poised Attacks
data.description: Attacks dealt from Improved or Perfect Balance are 10% harder to defend against.

data.name: Lingering Intimidation
data.description: Intimidating Blow will now reduce your target's chance to Critically hit by 25% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Forceful Shock
data.description: Blurring Shock now knocks back players and knocks down monsters.

data.name: Bladeshield
data.description: You become protected by a magical shell for a few moments which will strike back at any attacker for 600 damage and absorb up to 3600 damage for up to 10 seconds.

data.name: Impeccable Reactions
data.description: Each time you parry an attack, you will also parry the next attack. This double parry can not occur more than once every 5 seconds.

data.name: Adept Movements
data.description: Improved Stance abilities now cost 35% less AP.

data.name: Immaculate Defense
data.description: An impressive display of defense which reduces incoming damage by 75% for both you and all group members within 100 feet of you for 10 seconds.

data.name: Quick Incision
data.note:
Requires Improved Balance
Leads to Perfect Balance
data.description: A rapid slash to your opponents legs that deals 156 damage and snares them by 40% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Blurring Shock
data.note:
Requires Perfect Balance
Leads to Normal Balance
data.description: A powerful slash that deals 194 Spirit damage. For the next 10 seconds, each time the target is critically hit, they take an additional 112 Spirit damage.

data.name: Gryphon's Lash
data.note: Leads to Improved Balance
data.description: A fierce attack that deals 194 damage and cannot be Blocked or Parried.

data.name: Nature's Blade
data.description:
You enchant your blade with the spirit of nature. All your melee attacks gain a 25% chance to randomly steal 120 stat points from targets within 30 feet of you for 10 seconds. During this time, both you and groupmates within 100 feet will benefit from the stolen stats.

You may only have 1 Blade Enchantment active at a time.

data.name: Wall of Darting Steel
data.note: Requires Great Weapon
data.description: You spin your greatsword with astounding speed, forming a wall of steel between you and your opponent. Your chances to Dodge, Disrupt and Parry attacks are increased by 50%, and whenever you defend against an attack, you will reflect back 150 Spirit damage.

data.name: Deep Incision
data.description: Quick Incision will now inflict an additional 628 damage over 10 seconds.

data.name: Sapping Strike
data.note:
Requires Improved Balance
Leads to Perfect Balance
data.description: A targeted strike that saps the energy from your target dealing 156 damage and reducing your opponent's AP by 10 every second for 5 seconds.

data.name: Balanced Accuracy
data.description: Increases your chance to critically hit by 10% while you have Improved Balance, or 20% while you have Perfect Balance.

data.name: Phoenix's Wing
data.note:
Requires Improved Balance
Leads to Perfect Balance
Requires Great Weapon
data.description: A broad slash that hits all opponents in front of you for 175 Spirit damage.

data.name: Great Weapon Mastery
data.description: When you are wielding a great weapon, your chance to parry is increased by 5% and all damage you deal is increased by 10%.

data.name: Ether Dance
data.note:
Requires Perfect Balance
Leads to Normal Balance
Requires Great Weapon
data.description: You focus on your target, slashing repeatedly for up to 3 seconds, striking them up to five times and dealing 274 Spirit damage with each hit.

data.name: Whirling Geyser
data.note: Requires Great Weapon
data.description: A spinning attack that inflicts 1200 damage to all enemies within 30 feet and then knocks them away.

data.name: Eagle's Flight
data.note:
Requires Improved Balance
Leads to Perfect Balance
data.description: A guarded strike that deals 194 damage and improves your chance to parry by 25% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Phantom's Blade
data.description:
You enchant your blade with the spirits of the dead. All your melee attacks have a 25% chance to increase your group's Wounds by 48 for 10 seconds. Anyone affected will be healed for the amount increased.

You may only have 1 Blade Enchantment active at a time.

data.name: Graceful Strike
data.note: Leads to Improved Balance
data.description: A swift attack that deals 97 damage and an additional 185 damage over 5 seconds. Monsters struck with this technique will hate you more.

data.name: Dragon's Talon
data.note:
Requires Perfect Balance
Leads to Normal Balance
data.description: You release two rending blows that deal 134 Spirit damage each, crippling your target for 4 seconds, reducing the damage they deal with every attack to 80%.

data.name: Intimidating Blow
data.note:
Requires Improved Balance
Leads to Perfect Balance
data.description: An overpowering strike that deals 231 damage and decreases your opponent's morale by 100.

data.name: Perfect Defenses
data.description: Increase Block and Parry chances by 5% when in Improved Balance, and 10% when in Perfect balance.

data.name: Redirected Force
data.note: Requires Block, Disrupt, Dodge, or Parry.
data.description: Redirects the force of a blocked blow into a devastating attack dealing 231 damage and generating a large amount of additional hate from monsters.

data.name: Vaul's Buffer
data.description: On a successful Block, Parry, Dodge or Disrupt you will absorb up to 600 damage over the next 10 seconds. This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Crushing Advance
data.note:
Requires Improved Balance
Leads to Perfect Balance
Requires Shield
data.description: A calculated shield maneuver that inflicts 194 damage to all enemies 15 feet in front of you and interrupts any spells they are casting. Additionally, for the next 20 seconds, your block rate is increased by 5% and your armor will be increased by 990 points.

data.name: Raking Talons
data.description: Dragon's Talon now additionally affects all enemies within 20 feet of your target.

data.name: Vaul's Tempering
data.note:
Requires Perfect Balance
Leads to Normal Balance
data.description: An enchantment which calls upon the power of Vaul, rendering yourself and any of your groupmates within 30 feet of you immune to crowd control effects for 4 seconds and reducing incoming damage by 10%.

data.name: Shield of Valor
data.note: Requires Shield
data.description: Everyone in your group regains 200 action points and is protected by a magical barrier for 10 seconds which will absorb up to 4500 damage.

data.name: Ensorcelled Blow
data.note: Leads to Improved Balance
data.description: A quick precision slash that calls out the enchantment in your blade dealing 156 Spirit damage.

data.name: Dazzling Strike
data.note:
Requires Perfect Balance
Leads to Normal Balance
data.description: When your blade hits your opponent it releases a blinding flash of light that deals 306 Spirit damage, and disorients your target for 5 seconds, increasing their build times by 50%.

data.name: Wrath of Hoeth
data.note:
Requires Improved Balance
Leads to Perfect Balance
data.description: The magic from your blade is released in a staggering explosion that deals 170 Spirit damage to all opponents within 30 feet. In addition your opponent's Spiritual resistance will be reduced by 378 for 20 seconds.

data.name: Gusting Wind
data.note:
Requires Perfect Balance
Leads to Normal Balance
data.description: You execute a quick spin, rending the air around you and producing a magical shockwave that which deals 95 Spirit damage to all opponents within 30 feet of you, knocking back enemy players and knocking down monsters.

data.name: Heaven's Blade
data.description:
You enchant your blade with the spirit of the heavens. All your melee attacks gain a 25% chance on hit to reduce all of your enemy's resistances by 252 for 10 seconds.

You may only have 1 Blade Enchantment active at a time.

data.name: Calming Winds
data.description: Increase Disrupt chance by 10% when in Improved Balance, and 20% when in Perfect balance.

data.name: Protection of Hoeth
data.note: Leads to Improved Balance
data.description: You call upon the magic in your blade to form a barrier to protect you and any groupmates within 50 feet of you, absorbing up to 825 damage for up to 5 seconds.

data.name: Blinding Strike
data.description: Dazzling Strike will now reduce the target's chance to defend attacks by 10% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Crashing Wave
data.note:
Requires Perfect Balance
Leads to Normal Balance
data.description: You launch two powerful blows dealing a total of 350 Spirit damage and knocking your opponent down for 3 seconds.

data.name: Blessing of Heaven
data.description: Path of Hoeth abilities will place an effect on your target for 10 seconds. During this time, any allies who strike the target will recover 132 health over 3 seconds.

data.name: Whispering Wind
data.note:
Requires Perfect Balance
Leads to Normal Balance
data.description: You release a single swift blow damaging enemies 30 feet in front of you for 39 Spirit damage. The winds then aid group members within 100 feet for the next 10 seconds by decreasing the cooldown of abilities used by 5 seconds.

data.name: Shadow Blades
data.description: All enemies within 25 feet suffer 1800 damage and lose 1800 morale over 12 seconds.
